comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/61910968@N05] I was the same age at that time!
I love traveling by train and here in my region there is a railway station which was shut down and turned into a railway museum.

I traveled a lot by train as a child, was a magical time!
Greetings from Brazil!
